name.description: Identifies the asset to which this token represents

description.description: Describes the asset to which this token represents

image.description: A URI pointing to a resource with mime type image/* representing the asset to which this token represents. Consider making any images at a width between 320 and 1080 pixels and aspect ratio between 1.91:1 and 4:5 inclusive.

animation_url.description: A URI pointing to a resource with mime type video/* or audio/* or vr/* or html/* representing a multi-media attachment of the asset. Consider making any videos at a width between 320 and 1080 pixels and aspect ratio between 1.91:1 and 4:5 inclusive.

external_url.description: A URI pointing to an external resource that will take user outside of the platform.

seller_fee_basis_points.description: Royalties percentage awarded to creators, represented as a 'basis point' (i.e., multiple the percentage by 100: 75% = 7500)

properties.description: Arbitrary properties. Values may be strings, numbers, object or arrays.

type.description: The MIME type for this file

creators.description: Contains list of creators, each with Solana address and share of the NFT

share.description: Percentage of royalties to send to this address, represented as a percentage (0-100). The sum of all shares must equal 100
